title: The Legendary Engie - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   Psychological   Romance   Shounen   Slice of Life
tags: Angels   Beautiful Female Lead   Calm Protagonist   Caring Protagonist   Clingy Lover   Demi-Humans   Depictions of Cruelty   Dragons   Engineer   Fallen Angels   Flashbacks   Male Protagonist   Multiple POV   Past Plays a Big Role   Past Trauma   Post-apocalyptic   Strong Love Interests   Sword And Magic   Technological Gap   Time Travel   Weak Protagonist
author: Alice Taro   앨리스타로
description: When an engineering graduate set off on one last graduation road trip, the last thing he expected was to wake up in a world of swords and magic. Having saved a girl from the brink of death, he finds himself being tasked with bringing modern civilisation into this new world. But just why on earth is the strongest girl under the heavens clinging to him so tightly?>
